items.sentence: Tom shouldn't have ever tried to do that by himself.
My family consists of my father, mother, and sister.
They couldn't do anything but stand there and stare.
If it's OK for Tom to buy a knife, then why can't I?
Tom shouldn't have ever tried doing that on his own.
Some interesting questions came up in today's class.
Tom is the one who comes up with all the good ideas.
You aren't thinking of taking Tom with you, are you?
Tom's only too happy to lend a hand where necessary.
That's not the main reason why Tom ought to do that.
